John & Dennis Searles Wagon Routes Monum.knownFor: “ HISTORICAL MONUMENTS ” Reviewed 3 weeks ago These monuments commemorate John & Dennis Searles two Borax wagon routes. It is located at the intersection of California Highway 178 and Pinnacle road just west of Trona, Ca. This is the area where the 20 Mule team wagons hauled Borax to Mojave. Wing Commander flew in for the road trip to Death Valley. Trona Road, the Pinnacles and hello for a burg in town ... all good bye. We loved the drive.
Fun place to visit and spend time hiking. Lots of places to take photos and for children to climb. You might recognize the pinnacles in some popular films.
